attributes.action: Allow people over 60 to apply for Mobility Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, if you receive mobility allowance and reach the age of 60 years, your allowance will continue.  However, if you didn't apply before your 60th birthday, you are not entitled to receive mobility allowance.

Such age discrimination is most unfair.
